title: How to Draw a Caveman Head

steps.headline: Draw a small circle in the center of your page.
steps.description:
{"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/6/6e/Caveman01.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/6/6e/Caveman01.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":460,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":760,"licensing":"

My own drawing for wikiHow project.

Image by: Uploader
License: Creative Commons

"}/

steps.headline: Draw two smaller semicircle shapes, one on each side of the first circle.
steps.description:
This is the nose. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/d/d1/Caveman02.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/d/d1/Caveman02.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":460,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":760,"licensing":"

My own drawing for wikiHow project.

Image by: Uploader
License: Creative Commons

"}

steps.headline: Draw two horizontal lines, one on each side of the nose shape.
steps.description:
This line will appear to be one line behind the nose. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/e/e7/Caveman03.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/e/e7/Caveman03.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":460,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":760,"licensing":"

My own drawing for wikiHow project.

Image by: Uploader
License: Creative Commons

"}

steps.headline: Draw two slightly larger semicircles.
steps.description:
These shapes start at the center of each horizontal line and meet on top of the nose shape. These will become the eyes. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/4/4f/Caveman04.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/4/4f/Caveman04.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":460,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":760,"licensing":"

My own drawing for wikiHow project.

Image by: Uploader
License: Creative Commons

"}

steps.headline: Draw a horizontal line through both of the semicircle eye shapes.
steps.description:
This forms the eyelids. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/a/ae/Caveman05.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/a/ae/Caveman05.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":460,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":760,"licensing":"

My own drawing for wikiHow project.

Image by: Uploader
License: Creative Commons

"}

steps.headline: Draw two semicircles inside each eye shape.
steps.description:
Fill in these shapes. Your caveman can see you now. Put some pants on. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/c/c4/Caveman06.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/c/c4/Caveman06.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":460,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":760,"licensing":"

My own drawing for wikiHow project.

Image by: Uploader
License: Creative Commons

"}

steps.headline: Draw two oval shapes at the side of the eyes, one to the right and one to the left.
steps.description:
These are the ears. Your caveman can hear you now. Turn down the music. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/4/4e/Caveman07.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/4/4e/Caveman07.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":460,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":760,"licensing":"

My own drawing for wikiHow project.

Image by: Uploader
License: Creative Commons

"}

steps.headline: Draw a tall semicircle shape to form a forehead.
steps.description:
{"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/1/1e/Caveman08.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/1/1e/Caveman08.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":460,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":760,"licensing":"

My own drawing for wikiHow project.

Image by: Uploader
License: Creative Commons

"}

steps.headline: Put a friendly smile beneath the nose.
steps.description:
He is a happy caveman. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/6/6f/Caveman09.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/6/6f/Caveman09.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":460,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":760,"licensing":"

My own drawing for wikiHow project.

Image by: Uploader
License: Creative Commons

"}

steps.headline: Draw a wavy or curly line completely around the outside of your caveman's face.
steps.description:
Color him in any way that makes you happy. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/a/a9/Caveman10.JPG","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/a/a9/Caveman10.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":460,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":760,"licensing":"

My own drawing for wikiHow project.

Image by: Uploader
License: Creative Commons

"}
